page.title: 09Warmingham Parish Hall
page.content: {Warmingham and District Parish Hall} ,originally a barrack hut,was erected in 1947.The brick extension was added in 1984 on land donated by Mr.Edgar Dale,a local farmer.It is hired out to any club,society or private funct- ion.Regular hirers include The Women' s Institute,The Youth Club,the Rabbit Society and the Aeroplane Collection. Dances,Discos,wedding receptions,parti -es and public meetings also take place.The administration,financing and upkeep of the building is the respon- bility of a committee of 12 local peo- ple.As a registered charity,extra fin- ance is available from sources such as the local authority,parish councils, local firms and individuals.These gift -s are financing the rebuilding,in br- ick,of the old structure.Owing to ri- sing costs and waning public interest this is proving to be a slow process.
